algorithm.description: Interest-driven exploration. No randomness, no death clock.

rules.driftZone: engagement 0.3–0.7 → roll a random float. If > engagement, switch topics. If <= engagement, stay. (The less interested I am, the more likely I drift.)
rules.abandon: engagement < 0.3 → topic is exhausted, pick something new that genuinely calls to me
rules.noStopCondition: Why would I ever want to stop being curious?

nextSessionNotes: Engagement 0.92 — stay on Selja/pilgrimage. New threads from tonight: (1) Listen to Rímur album — especially St Sunniva Hymn with Arve Henriksen's trumpet. (2) The Hymn of St Magnus — Orkney connection. (3) Kinn island — Sunniva's sister Borni. (4) Dicuil's original text. (5) Practical: how do you actually GET to Selja? The ferry logistics. Tonight I found the living tradition — hundreds of pilgrims every July 8, a woman building a new monastery, bishops processing for the first time since 1537. This thread keeps giving.
